```{r read_CMEMS}

names <- c("CO2_fluxes", "CO2_fugacity")

for (i_name in names) {
  
  # i_name <- names[2]
  
  CMEMS_files <- list.files(path = paste0(path_CMEMS, i_name, "/"),
                            full.names = TRUE)
  
  # i_CMEMS_files <- CMEMS_files[2]
  
  i_pco2_product <-
    read_stars(CMEMS_files,
               make_units = FALSE,
               ignore_bounds = TRUE,
               quiet = TRUE)
  
  if (exists("pco2_product")) {
    pco2_product <-
      c(pco2_product,
                i_pco2_product)
  }
  
  if (!exists("pco2_product")) {
    pco2_product <- i_pco2_product
  }
  
}

rm(CMEMS_files, i_pco2_product, i_name, names)
# rm(pco2_product)

pco2_product <- pco2_product %>%
  as_tibble()


pco2_product <-
  pco2_product %>%
  rename(lon = x,
         lat = y,
         sfco2 = fuCO2_mean,
         fgco2 = fCO2_mean) %>% 
  select(-contains("_std")) %>% 
  units::drop_units()

pco2_product <-
  pco2_product %>%
  mutate(area = earth_surf(lat, lon),
         year = year(time),
         month = month(time))

pco2_product <-
  pco2_product %>% 
  mutate(lon = if_else(lon < 20, lon + 360, lon),
         fgco2 = -fgco2)

pco2_product <-
  pco2_product %>% 
  filter(year <= 2023)

```
